T1h1e1 1p1r1e1v1i1o1u1s1 1a1r1t1i1c1l1e1 1o1n1 1h1o1w1 1t1o1 1p1r1a1c1t1i1c1e1 1d1r1a1w1i1n1g1 1s1c1i1e1n1c1e1 1c1a1n1 1a1l1s1o1 1b1e1 1a1p2l1i1e1d1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1f1i1e1l1d1 1o1f1 1m1o1t1i1o1n1 1g1r1a1p1h1i1c1s1.1 1I1n1t1e1r1e1s1t1e1d1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1c1a1n1 1r1e1a1d1 1t1h1e1 1a1r1t1i1c1l1e1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1f1a1n1p1a1g1e1,1 1t1h1e1 1l1i1n1k1 1i1s1 1u1n1d1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1m2e1n1t1 1s1e1c1t1i1o1n1.1 1W1e1 1w1i1l2 1a1l1s1o1 1i1n1t1r1o1d1u1c1e1 1s1o1m1e1 1f1a1m1o1u1s1 1f1o1r1e1i1g1n1 1w1e1b1s1i1t1e1s1 1i1n1 1t1h1i1s1 1f1i1e1l1d1,1 1i1n1 1c1a1s1e1 1y1o1u1 1r1e1a1l2y1 1w1a1n1t1 1t1o1 1s1t1u1d1y1 1i1t1 1y1o1u1r1s1e1l1f1.1

2T1h1e1 1p1r1o1b1l1e1m1 1w1i1t1h1 1m1o1t1i1o1n1 1g1r1a1p1h1i1c1s1 1d1e1s1i1g1n1e1r1s1 1i1n1 1p1a1r1t1i1c1u1l1a1r1,1 1a1n1d1 1o1f1 1c1r1e1a1t1o1r1s1 1i1n1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1l1,1 1i1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1d1u1c1t1s1 1t1h1e1y1 1m1a1d1e1 1a1r1e1 1a1l1w1a1y1s1 1u1n1d1e1r1e1s1t1i1m1a1t1e1d1 1b1y1 1t1h1e1 1p1u1b1l1i1c1.1 1P1e1r1h1a1p1s1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1a1r1e1 1a1c2u1s1t1o1m1e1d1 1t1o1 1w1a1t1c1h1i1n1g1 1b1l1o1c1k1b1u1s1t1e1r1s1 1o1f1 1D1i1s1n1e1y1,1 1P1i1x1a1r1 1o1r1 1G1h1i1b1l1i1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1n1 1t1h1i1n1k1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1o1 1d1o1 1s1o1 1i1s1 1o1b1v1i1o1u1s1 1a1n1d1 1e1a1s1y1 1(1t1h1e1r1e1 1e1v1e1n1 1e1x1i1s1t1s1 1t1h1e1 1v1i1e1w1 1t1h1a1t1 1c1a1r1t1o2n1s1 1a1r1e1 1a1l1w1a1y1s1 1s1i1m1p1l1e1r1 1t1h1a1n1 1l1i1v1e1 1a1c1t1i1o1n1 1m1o1v1i1e1s1)1.1

2T1h1e1 1r1e1a1s1o1n1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1i1s1 1e1x1p1e1n1s1i1v1e1 1p1r1i1c1e1 1i1s1 1b1e1c1a1u1s1e1 1b1e1s1i1d1e1s1 1t1h1e1 1a1r1t1i1s1t1 1h1a1v1i1n1g1 1t1o1 1s1p1e1n1d1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1w1o1r1k1i1n1g1 1d1a1y1 1f1o1r1 1j1u1s1t1 1o1n1e1 1o1r1 1t1w1o1 1d1r1a1w1i1n1g1s1,1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1t1i1o1n1 1g1r1a1p1h1i1c1s1 1d1e1s1i1g1n1e1r1 1a1l1s1o1 1t1a1k1e1s1 1a1l2 1d1a1y1 1t1o1 1f1i1n1i1s1h1 1a1 1s1c1e1n1e1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1s1e1c1o1n1d1s1.1 1T1h1e1 1h1i1g1h1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1l1e1v1e1l1 1o1f1 1c1o1m1p1l1e1x1i1t1y1 1a1n1d1 1d1e1t1a1i1l1,1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1r1e1 1t1i1m1e1 1i1s1 1s1p1e1n1t1.1 1T1i1m1e1,1 1i1s1 1m1o1n1e1y1 1i1t1s1e1l1f1.1

2I1t1 1i1s1 1e1a1s1y1 1f1o1r1 1y1o1u1 1t1o1 1a1s1k1 1a1 1m1o1t1i1o1n1 1d1e1s1i1g1n1e1r1 1"1t1o1 1h1e1l1p1 1m1a1k1i1n1g1 1a1 1s1h1o1r1t1 1v1i1d1e1o1,1 1l1i1k1e1 1M1o1n1s1t1e1r1 1B1o1x1,1 1t1h1a1t1'1s1 1e1a1s1y1"1,1 1b1u1t1 1a1c1t1u1a1l2y1 1i1t1'1s1 1s1i1m1i1l1a1r1 1t1o1 1a1s1k1 1a1 1t1a1i1l1o1r1 1t1o1 1s1e1w1 1s1u1i1t1s1 1f1o1r1 1f1r1e2 1(1s1u1p2o1s1e1 1e1a1c1h1 1s1u1i1t1 1c1o1s1t1s1 1m1i1l2i1o1n1 1V1N1D1)1 1o1r1 1a1s1k1 1t1h1e1 1d1i1r1e1c1t1o1r1 1o1f1 1a1 1b1a1n1k1 1b1r1a1n1c1h1 1t1o1 1t1a1k1e1 1c1a1r1e1 1o1f1 1y1o1u1r1 1b1o2k1s1 1w1i1t1h1i1n1 1m1o1n1t1h1.1 1I1f1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1t1w1o1 1r1e1q1u1e1s1t1s1 1a1r1e1 1a1b1s1u1r1d1,1 1t1h1e1n1 1w1h1y1 1i1s1 1t1h1e1 1f1i1r1s1t1 1o1n1e1 1r1e1a1s1o1n1a1b1l1e1?1
2I1n1 1o1r1d1e1r1 1t1o1 1c1r1e1a1t1e1 1t1h1e1 1s1h1o1r1t1 1v1i1d1e1o1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1y1o1u1 1u1s1u1a1l2y1 1w1a1t1c1h1 1f1o1r1 1a1 1f1e1w1 1m1i1n1u1t1e1s1,1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1s1i1t2i1n1g1 1"1b1e1h1i1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1s1c1e1n1e1"1 1h1a1d1 1t1o1 1s1p1e1n1d1 1y1e1a1r1s1 1j1u1s1t1 1t1o1 1l1e1a1r1n1 1h1o1w1 1t1o1 1u1s1e1 1t1h1e1 1t1o2l1s1 1a1n1d1 1t1o1 1a1c1q1u1i1r1e1 1e1s2e1n1t1i1a1l1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1.1 1O1n1c1e1 1y1o1u1 1h1a1v1e1 1m1a1s1t1e1r1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1t1e1c1h1n1i1c1a1l1 1s1k1i1l2s1,1 1t1h1e1n1 1i1t1 1w1a1s1n1'1t1 1j1u1s1t1 1"1p1r1e1s2i1n1g1 1a1 1f1e1w1 1b1u1t2o1n1s1 1t1o1 1f1i1n1i1s1h1"1 1(1b1e1c1a1u1s1e1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1w1a1s1 1n1o1 1s1o1f1t1w1a1r1e1 1l1i1k1e1 1t1h1a1t1)1.1 1J1u1s1t1 1c1l1i1c1k1i1n1g1 1a1n1d1 1p1r1e1s2i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1b1u1t2o1n1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1r1e1,1 1b1u1t1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1c1t1u1a1l2y1 1h1a1v1e1 1t1o1 1c1l1i1c1k1 1a1n1d1 1p1r1e1s2 1a1 1l1o1t1 1o1f1 1t1h1i1n1g1s1 1f1o1r1 1s1o1m1e1t1h1i1n1g1 1y1o1u1 1t1h1i1n1k1 1i1s1 1s1i1m1p1l1e1.1
2I1f1 1t1h1e1y1 1w1a1n1t1 1t1o1 1c1r1e1a1t1e1 1a1 1s1c1e1n1e1 1w1h1e1r1e1 1a1 1c1h1a1r1a1c1t1e1r1 1i1s1 1w1a1l1k1i1n1g1,1 1e1v1e1n1 1i1f1 1t1h1e1y1 1k1n1o1w1 1e1x1a1c1t1l1y1 1w1h1a1t1 1t1o1 1d1o1,1 1t1h1e1y1 1s1t1i1l2 1h1a1v1e1 1t1o1 1s1t1a1r1t1 1e1v1e1r1y1t1h1i1n1g1 1o1v1e1r1 1a1g1a1i1n1.1 1T1h1e1r1e1 1a1r1e1 1n1o1 1b1u1t2o1n1s1 1t1o1 1h1e1l1p1 1c1r1e1a1t1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1"1s1i1m1p1l1e1"1 1s1c1e1n1e1.1 1Y1o1u1 1h1a1v1e1 1t1o1 1r1i1g2i1n1g1,1 1t1h1e1n1 1l1e1t1 1e1a1c1h1 1m1o1v1i1n1g1 1p1a1r1t1 1m1o1v1e1 1l1i1t2l1e1 1b1y1 1l1i1t2l1e1,1 1w1h1i1l1e1 1a1w1a1r1e1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1o1s1i1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1l1e1g1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1e1r1s1 1i1n1 1c1o1r2e1l1a1t1i1o1n1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1 1h1a1n1d1s1 1.3 1Y1o1u1 1c1a1n1 1w1a1t1c1h1 1t1h1e1 1a1t2a1c1h1e1d1 1v1i1d1e1o1 1u1n1d1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1m2e1n1t1 1s1e1c1t1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1v1i1s1u1a1l1i1z1e1 1e1a1s1i1e1r1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2.1
2T1h1i1s1 1a1l1o1n1e1 1t1o2k1 1h1a1l1f1 1a1 1d1a1y1.1 1A1n1d1 1y1o1u1 1h1a1v1e1 1t1o1 1d1o1 1t1h1e1 1s1a1m1e1 1t1h1i1n1g1,1 1h1o1u1r1 1b1y1 1h1o1u1r1,1 1d1a1y1 1b1y1 1d1a1y1,1 1m1o1n1t1h1 1b1y1 1m1o1n1t1h1,1 1y1e1a1r1 1b1y1 1y1e1a1r1.1 1Y1o1u1 1s1i1t1 1i1n1 1f1r1o1n1t1 1o1f1 1t1w1o1 1c1o1m1p1u1t1e1r1 1s1c1r1e2n1s1,1 1a1l1i1g1n1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1m1 1l1i1t2l1e1 1b1y1 1l1i1t2l1e1,1 1a1d1j1u1s1t1i1n1g1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1m1i1l2i1m1e1t1e1r1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1i1m1a1g1e1 1m1o1v1i1n1g1 1i1n1 1m1i1l2i1s1e1c1o1n1d1s1 1j1u1s1t1 1t1o1 1c1r1e1a1t1e1 1p1r1o1d1u1c1t1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1l1e1t1 1t1h1e1 1a1u1d1i1e1n1c1e1 1f1e2l1 1"1s1m1o2t1h1"1 1a1n1d1 1"1r1e1a1s1o1n1a1b1l1e1"1.1
2T1h1i1s1 1w1o1r1k1 1w1e1a1r1s1 1o1u1t1 1m1o1r1e1 1m1i1n1d1 1a1n1d1 1e1n1e1r1g1y1 1t1h1a1n1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1t1h1i1n1k1.1 1S1o1m1e1t1i1m1e1s1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1i1s1 1n1e1w1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1s1o1m1e1o1n1e1 1h1a1s1 1c1o1l2a1p1s1e1d1 1o1n1 1h1i1s1 1d1e1s1k1,1 1o1f1t1e1n1 1r1e1l1a1t1e1d1 1t1o1 1m1a1k1i1n1g1 1v1i1d1e1o1s1 1l1i1k1e1 1t1h1i1s1.1 1P1e1o1p1l1e1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1s1a1m1e1 1i1n1d1u1s1t1r1y1 1a1l1s1o1 1h1u1m2e1d1,1 1s1t1a1r1t1l1e1d1,1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1n1 1c1o1n1t1i1n1u1e1d1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1n1a1t1u1r1a1l1 1c1y1c1l1e1 1a1s1 1i1f1 1"1s1u1r1e1l1y1 1d1e1a1t1h1 1s1p1a1r1e1d1 1m1e1 1o1v1e1r1"1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1 1i1n1d1e2d1 1r1e1s1p1e1c1t1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1o1w1n1 1s1e1l1f1 1a1n1d1 1c1a1r1e2r1.1

2L1i1f1e1 1o1f1 1P1i1 1p1r1o1d1u1c1t1i1o1n1 1s1t1u1d1i1o1,1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1r1e1c1e1i1v1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1O1s1c1a1r1 1-1 1a1n2o1u1n1c1e1d1 1b1a1n1k1r1u1p1t1c1y1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1h1a1v1e1 1e1v1e1n1 1m1a1d1e1 1a1 1d1o1c1u1m1e1n1t1a1r1y1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1t1h1i1s1.1 1A1t1 1t1h1e1 1O1s1c1a1r1s1 1c1e1r1e1m1o1n1y1,1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1s1p1e2c1h1e1s1 1w1e1r1e1 1f1o1r1c1e1d1 1t1o1 1e1n1d1 1s1o2n1,1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1o1r1g1a1n1i1z1e1r1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1l1a1n1e1t1'1s1 1m1o1s1t1 1p1r1e1s1t1i1g1i1o1u1s1 1a1w1a1r1d1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1e1n1t1e1r1t1a1i1n1m1e1n1t1 1i1n1d1u1s1t1r1y1 1e1v1e1n1 1t1o2k1 1a1n1 1i1m1p1o1l1i1t1e1 1a1c1t1 1o1f1 1i1n1s1e1r1t1i1n1g1 1m1u1s1i1c1 1t1o1 1i1n1t1e1r2u1p1t1 1t1h1e1m1 1-1 1a1l1t1h1o1u1g1h1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1s1p1e2c1h1 1i1s1 1n1o1 1l1o1n1g1e1r1 1t1h1a1n1 1a1n1y1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1a1c1t1o1r1s1.1 1T1h1e1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1s1i1t2i1n1g1 1b1e1l1o1w1 1c1a1n1 1o1n1l1y1 1l1a1u1g1h1 1a1n1d1 1t1r1e1a1t1 1i1t1 1a1s1 1a1 1j1o1k1e1.1
2T1h1e1 1a1g1e1 1o1f1 1e1n1t1e1r1t1a1i1n1m1e1n1t1 1a1n1d1 1c1o1n1s1u1m1p1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1f1r1e2 1v1i1s1u1a1l1 1p1r1o1d1u1c1t1s1 1i1s1 1p1u1t2i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1b1e1h1i1n1d1 1i1t1 1i1n1t1o1 1a1 1d1i1f2i1c1u1l1t1 1p1o1s1i1t1i1o1n1.1 1T1h1e1s1e1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1c1a1n1 1n1o1t1 1b1e1 1f1a1m1o1u1s1 1a1s1 1a1c1t1o1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1i1n1g1e1r1s1,1 1a1l1t1h1o1u1g1h1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1n1t1r1i1b1u1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1t1w1o1 1s1i1d1e1s1 1c1a1n1 1n1o1t1 1b1e1 1c1o1u1n1t1e1d1 1f1a1i1r1l1y1.1 1B1u1t1 1e1v1e1n1 1w1i1t1h1o1u1t1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1r1i1t1y1,1 1t1h1e1y1 1d1o1n1'1t1 1r1e1c1e1i1v1e1 1r1e1s1p1e1c1t1 1f1r1o1m1 1b1o1t1h1 1i1n1s1i1d1e1 1a1n1d1 1o1u1t1s1i1d1e1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1d1u1s1t1r1y1.1

2T1h1i1s1 1a1r1t1i1c1l1e1 1i1s1 1f1i1r1s1t1l1y1 1d1e1d1i1c1a1t1e1d1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1M1o1n1s1t1e1r1 1B1o1x1 1t1e1a1m1.1 1F1o1r1 1f1u1l1f1i1l2i1n1g1 1o1u1r1 1p1r1o1m1i1s1e1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1m2u1n1i1t1y1,1 1a1s1 1w1e1l2 1a1s1 1e1n1s1u1r1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1e1l1e1m1e1n1t1s1 1o1f1 1t1i1m1e1 1a1n1d1 1s1p1e1n1d1i1n1g1,1 1m1e1m1b1e1r1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1t1i1o1n1 1t1e1a1m1 1h1a1d1 1t1o1 1c1o1n1s1t1a1n1t1l1y1 1w1o1r1k1 1m1o1r1e1 1t1h1a1n1 1w1h1a1t1 1w1a1s1 1s1u1p2o1s1e1d1 1t1o1 1b1e1 1d1o1n1e1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1h1a1d1 1t1o1 1s1p1e1n1d1 1w1e2k1e1n1d1s1 1a1n1d1 1o1v1e1r1t1i1m1e1 1h1o1u1r1s1 1t1o1 1h1u1r2y1 1u1p1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1j1e1c1t1.1
2I1 1k1n1o1w1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1a1r1e1 1m1a1n1y1 1o1p1i1n1i1o1n1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1M1o1n1s1t1e1r1 1B1o1x1 1s1t1o1l1e1 1o1r1 1i1m1i1t1a1t1e1d1 1K1u1r1z1g1e1s1a1g1t1'1s1 1s1t1y1l1e1 1a1n1d1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1.1 1A1l2 1t1h1e1s1e1 1i1d1e1a1s1 1c1o1m1e1 1f1r1o1m1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1w1h1o1 1d1o1n1'1t1 1k1n1o1w1 1a1n1y1t1h1i1n1g1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1t1h1i1s1 1f1i1e1l1d1,1 1s1o1 1w1e1 1d1o1n1'1t1 1r1e1s1e1n1t1 1s1u1c1h1 1t1r1i1f1l1e1s1 1(1t1h1o1u1g1h1 1i1t1'1s1 1s1a1d1)1.1 1T1h1o1s1e1 1w1h1o1 1t1h1i1n1k1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1r1e1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1a1b1l1e1,1 1b1u1t1 1s1t1i1l2 1t1h1i1n1k1 1t1h1a1t1 1w1e1 1"1s1t1e1a1l1 1o1r1 1i1m1i1t1a1t1e1"1,1 1c1a1n1 1c1o1n1f1r1o1n1t1 1u1s1 1d1i1r1e1c1t1l1y1 1h1e1r1e1.1
2E1v1e1r1y1 1d1r1a1w1i1n1g1 1u1s1e1d1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1v1i1d1e1o1 1w1a1s1 1m1a1d1e1 1b1y1 1u1s1,1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1m1o1v1e1 1w1a1s1 1m1e1t1i1c1u1l1o1u1s1l1y1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2e1d1,1 1t1h1e1 1s1o1u1n1d1 1w1a1s1 1l1e1g1a1l2y1 1p1u1r1c1h1a1s1e1d1.1 1T1h1e1r1e1 1i1s1 1n1o1 1u1n1a1u1t1h1o1r1i1z1e1d1 1d1o1w1n1l1o1a1d1 1o1r1 1u1s1e1 1o1f1 1a1n1y1 1c1o1p1y1r1i1g1h1t1e1d1 1m1a1t1e1r1i1a1l1 1w1i1t1h1o1u1t1 1p1e1r1m1i1s2i1o1n1.1 1A1r1t1i1s1t1i1c1 1e1l1e1m1e1n1t1s1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1c1o1l1o1r1,1 1o1r1 1h1o1w1 1t1o1 1h1a1n1d1l1e1 1m1o1v1e1m1e1n1t1 1a1r1e1 1t1e1c1h1n1i1c1a1l1 1e1l1e1m1e1n1t1s1.1 1B1e1c1a1u1s1e1 1K1u1r1z1g1e1s1a1g1t1 1u1s1i1n1g1 1m1e1t1h1o1d1 1A1 1f1o1r1 1s1c1e1n1e1 1c1u1t2i1n1g1,1 1t1h1e1n1 1i1f1 1M1o1n1s1t1e1r1 1B1o1x1 1u1s1e1s1 1t1h1e1 1s1a1m1e1 1m1e1t1h1o1d1,1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1e1a1n1s1 1w1e1 1.3 1s1t1e1a1l1?1
2I1f1 1t1h1i1s1 1l1o1g1i1c1 1i1s1 1r1e1a1s1o1n1a1b1l1e1,1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1g1r1a1p1h1i1c1 1p1r1o1d1u1c1t1s1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1w1o1r1l1d1 1a1r1e1 1s1t1o1l1e1n1,1 1f1r1o1m1 1a1d1v1e1r1t1i1s1i1n1g1 1t1o1 1m1o1v1i1e1s1.1
